title: Insert script into .vsts file that sets a variable for our insertion branch
body:
script should:

take current branch name `vs16.8` for example, and store the `16.8` into a variable for use within the release. The release will then use that variable to target VS branch `rel/d16.8` in the pull request.

nodes.body: I suspect we can do this all in the release definition in VS without having to change our build outputs. There should be a variable for the branch of the artifact that triggered the release.
